newsitem.title: LATVIA: Unibanka, Daugavpils keep up Latvian stock rally.
newsitem.headline: Unibanka, Daugavpils keep up Latvian stock rally.

text.p: Latvian stock prices rallied further on Thursday with most blue-chips gaining ground and turnover more than doubling, dealers said.
Total market turnover came to 265,000 lats and the Rietumu Bank market index grew 4.34 percent to 164.56, beating its record for the second consecutive day.
Saules Bank index Saule10, which tracks the bourse's 10 most active listings, rose 4.56 percent to 166,79.
Both usual market leaders, the official list's Unibanka and Daugavpils Chain on the secondary list, kept up their previous pace.

Daugavpils Chain, which hopes to move to the official list, was market leader on turnover with trade of 106,000 lats against 20,300 lats. It rose 3.07 lats, a further rise of 40 santimes or 15 percent.
Unibanka registered its third record high in three days. It powered ahead to 3.61 lats, jumping a further 16 santimes. It had the second largest turnover at 47,000 lats.
Among fish canneries, Kaija was stable at 2.20 lats on volume of 13,700 lats while Ventspils surged 23 santimes to 1.81 lats, doubling in a weeks time. It turned over 1,200 lats.
Rigas Raugs yeast factory fell to 3.80 lats from 4.04 as it saw shares worth 19,000 lats change hands.
Elsewhere on the official list, Riga Transport Fleet had turnover of 11,200 lats as it rose five santimes to 1.70 lats.
Staburadze confectionery, another official list share also ticked up two santimes to 2.60 on trade of 4,100 lats.
Lode Brick factory maintained its slow rise, adding one santime to 2.07 lats turning over 9,000 lats.
